name: Star Mine
text:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
You can only Special Summon "Star Mine(s)" once per turn. If this card in its owner's possession is destroyed by an opponent's attack or card effect: Take 2000 damage, then inflict 2000 damage to your opponent. If a monster(s) in this card's adjacent Monster Zone(s) is destroyed by an opponent's attack or card effect: Destroy this card, and if you do, take 2000 damage, then inflict 2000 damage to your opponent.
